Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with narrow mouth and straight pointed rim. The walls of the body are almost straight with a highly marked curvature near the bottom. Stable base with flat-footed bottom. Ochre-coloured paste. Exterior and interior surface with yellowish coating. The exterior surface presents a painted decoration which encircles the piece: an undulating line in red with fruits in black.
